content.content: Now that I’m back from NFT NYC I’ve been reading up on what I missed and what the press has, or hasn’t been reporting about.  One article is a good for onboarding, I really hope people catch these articles and read them.    MUO – 25 Jun 22    What Is Dai (DAI) and Why Is It So Popular? Ever wondered what Dai is and how it works? Wonder no more...      The below article cites to the delegates and how they voted in the rETH collateral vote. I wonder if we will see more of these types of articles- digesting the votes- in the future. I guess we shall see.    The Defiant – 20 Jun 22    MakerDAO Token Holders Vote to Add Rocket Pool’s rETH as Collateral to Back... MakerDAO, the largest DeFi lender by total value locked, could soon allow another Ether derivative as collateral on its network.   Est. reading time: 3 minutes
